scripts.jekyll: bash -c 'export PATH="$HOME/.rbenv/bin:$PATH" && eval "$(rbenv init -)" && bin/jekyll serve --incremental --limit_posts 10'
scripts.jekyll-original: bash -c 'export PATH="$HOME/.rbenv/bin:$PATH" && eval "$(rbenv init -)" && bin/jekyll serve --livereload'
scripts.fresh: npm run clean-all && npm run dev
scripts.build: bash -c 'export PATH="$HOME/.rbenv/bin:$PATH" && eval "$(rbenv init -)" && tailwindcss -i ./assets/css/input.css -o ./assets/css/output.css && bin/jekyll build'
